approveRewardToken().details: Approves Liquidator to spend reward tokens

checkBalance(address).details: Get the total bAsset value held in the platform     This includes any interest that was generated since depositing     Aave gradually increases the balances of all aToken holders, as the interest grows
checkBalance(address).return: balance    Total value of the bAsset in the platform

deposit(address,uint256,bool).details: Deposit a quantity of bAsset into the platform. Credited aTokens     remain here in the vault. Can only be called by whitelisted addresses     (mIx and corresponding BasketManager)

params._hasTxFee: Is the bAsset known to have a tx fee?

deposit(address,uint256,bool).return: quantityDeposited   Quantity of bAsset that entered the platform

initialize(address,address[],address,add.details: Initialization function for upgradable proxy contract.     This function should be called via Proxy just after contract deployment.

reApproveAllTokens().details: Re-approve the spending of all bAssets by the Aave lending pool core,     if for some reason is it necessary for example if the address of core changes.     Only callable through Governance.

setPTokenAddress(address,address).details: Provide support for bAsset by passing its pToken address. This method can only be called by the system Governor

params._pToken: Address for the corresponding platform token

withdraw(address,address,uint256,bool).details: Withdraw a quantity of bAsset from the platform

params._hasTxFee: Is the bAsset known to have a tx fee?
params._receiver: Address to which the bAsset should be sent

withdraw(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: Withdraw a quantity of bAsset from the platform

params._amount: Units of bAsset to send to recipient
params._hasTxFee: Is the bAsset known to have a tx fee?
params._receiver: Address to which the bAsset should be sent
params._totalAmount: Total units to pull from lending platform

withdrawRaw(address,address,uint256).details: Withdraw a quantity of bAsset from the cache.

params._receiver: Address to which the bAsset should be sent

userdoc.notice: A simple connection to deposit and withdraw bAssets from Aave
